GET STARTED

hamilton & bolt

Two passionate proffesionals who have been servicing the Pacific North West since 2010

Hamilton & Bolt was created in 2010 with the intent of providing the Pacific North West with easy access to luxury homes. Chris Hamilton & Rachel Bolt met at Windermere together as two brokers trying to make it big. After 5 years at Windermere developing relationships and partnerships they decided to branch out and start their own partnership. 12 years later they are their firm is the leading entity providing luxury homes in the PNW.
